originalText.text: Sometime you have no choice but to put your children into certain schools. I thought it was a good school because it was a great school when my niece and nephew went, Hmmmm just make sure if you put your child in this school, please be on top of what's happening in the building. originalText.text: My experience with P.S 108, Assemblyman Angelo del Toro has been the worst yet. The school is not what it used to be. The overall performance of the school is unacceptable. The students are extremely disrespectful, its disgusting. The staff does the best they czn but they can do a lot better. Hopefully the new principal can change the school for the better. Overall i give the school a thumbs down!
